items.creator: Daniel Oberhaus
items.title: Will We Recognize Life on Mars When We See It?
items.dc:creator: Daniel Oberhaus
items.content: If NASA's Perseverance rover finds life on the Red Planet, there's a good chance our first extraterrestrial encounter will be a little ambiguous.
items.contentSnippet: If NASA's Perseverance rover finds life on the Red Planet, there's a good chance our first extraterrestrial encounter will be a little ambiguous.

items.title: 'Palm Springs' Is a Timely Comedy About Being Stuck in the Now

items.content: In Hulu’s new romantic comedy, every day feels the same. Sound familiar?

items.creator: Rita Katz
items.title: Neo-Nazis Are Running Out of Places to Hide Online

items.title: Major iOS 14 Features and How to Download the Public Beta

items.creator: Roger McNamee
items.title: Dear Joe Biden: Don't Listen to Silicon Valley
items.dc:creator: Roger McNamee
items.content: Unlike 20 years ago, today’s Silicon Valley culture is elitist and authoritarian. Its leaders are part of the problem, not the solution.
items.contentSnippet: Unlike 20 years ago, today’s Silicon Valley culture is elitist and authoritarian. Its leaders are part of the problem, not the solution.

items.creator: Grace Huckins
items.title: Covid Kills More Men Than Women. Experts Still Can’t Explain Why
items.dc:creator: Grace Huckins
items.content: A new tracker from Harvard’s GenderSci Lab is the first to consolidate sex-separated data from across the US. It may help researchers solve the mystery.
items.contentSnippet: A new tracker from Harvard’s GenderSci Lab is the first to consolidate sex-separated data from across the US. It may help researchers solve the mystery.

items.title: Alienware M15 R2 Review: A Powerful Gaming Laptop

items.creator: Noelle Mateer
items.title: Linkin Park T-Shirts Are All the Rage in China
items.dc:creator: Noelle Mateer
items.content: The band hasn't been cool for years. But its Minutes to Midnight logo is everywhere in the most populous country in the world.

items.creator: Steven Levy
items.title: Larry Brilliant on How Well We Are Fighting Covid-19
items.dc:creator: Steven Levy

items.contentSnippet: Three months ago, the epidemiologist weighed in on what we must do to defeat this new threat. We went back to ask: How are we doing, and what comes next?

items.creator: Aarian Marshall
items.title: Uber Quietly Recruits Allies to Battle Cities Over User Data
items.dc:creator: Aarian Marshall
items.content: Nonprofits and advocacy groups signed on to an organization called Communities Against Rider Surveillance—without knowing that the ride-hail giant was involved.
items.contentSnippet: Nonprofits and advocacy groups signed on to an organization called Communities Against Rider Surveillance—without knowing that the ride-hail giant was involved.

items.creator: Sidney Fussell
items.title: An Audit Slams Facebook as a Home for Misinformation and Hate
items.dc:creator: Sidney Fussell

items.contentSnippet: In a meeting and an unusual report, activist groups that instigated an ad boycott of the social media company say it has not responded adequately to criticism.

items.title: Hong Kong's Security Law Puts Big Tech at a Crossroads

items.title: America Has a Sick Obsession with Covid-19 Polls
